channel.title: Endeavouros on credibleDEV
channel.description: Recent content in Endeavouros on credibleDEV

item.title: Install Pamac on EndeavourOS
item.description: EndeavourOS doesn't come with a GUI package manager so this guide will show you how to install pamac on EndeavourOS with just one command.

item.title: How to Install Flatpak on EndeavourOS, Manjaro and Arch Linux
item.description: Flatpak's make installing software on Linux a breeze. Today, we discuss how to get started with Flatpak on EndeavourOS, Manjaro and Arch Linux.
